title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed consistently in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Retrieve datetime values from a table. 2. Display the values in a dynamic text item. 3. Display the values in a data/text item. 4. Compare the formats of the datetime values in both displays.
